snippet: Berj Najarian, the Patriots’ director of football/head coach administration, is the gatekeeper to Coach Bill Belichick and a key figure in the team’s inner circle.
abstract: Berj Najarian, the New England Patriots’ director of football/head coach administration, is the gatekeeper to coach Bill Belichick and a key figure in the team’s inner circle.
lead_paragraph: Berj Najarian, the Patriots’ director of football/head coach administration, is the gatekeeper to Coach Bill Belichick and a key figure in the team’s inner circle.

headline.seo: Blocking for the Patriots Coach So He Can Do His Job
headline.main: Blocking for the Patriots Coach So He Can Do His Job
headline.print_headline: The Gatekeepers: Blocking for Belichick, Without a Jersey
